bug.author: lluunn
bug.summary: kfctl cannot infer project when not set
bug.description:
/kind bug What steps did you take and what happened: I am using the latest config from master (removing the dummy value of project/email) <denchmark-code>kfctl init --config=kfctl_gcp_iap.yaml kfctl generate all </denchmark-code>
The project field is missing, and hostname treat it as empty string kf0815-2.endpoints..cloud.goog It can infer the email though. gcloud config has both email and project set: <denchmark-code>$ gcloud config list [compute] region = us-central1 zone = us-central1-a [core] account = lunkai@google.com disable_usage_reporting = True project = kai-test2
Your active configuration is: [default] </denchmark-code>
cc <denchmark-link:https://github.com/jlewi>@jlewi</denchmark-link>
